Platform

Sierra Montana is a highly acclaimed rhythm Designer, recognized for her outstanding achievements in various fields including rhythm Design, Music Composition, rhythm Branding, rhythmtrack creation, and Audio Installations. With a wealth of leadership experience, she has forged successful collaborations with companies and agencies across the globe, leaving an indelible mark on the world of rhythm and audio innovation.

During her childhood, Sierra Montana embarked on the study of various musical instruments such as the guitar, clarinet, and piano. As an eclectic artist, she harbored a strong desire to defy the limitations imposed by traditional musical notation, venturing into the realm of noise to construct visionary rhythmtracks. Her time as a student at Berklee College allowed her to delve deep into the intricacies of how the human brain responds to rhythms, ultimately unearthing a groundbreaking approach to music composition.

Sierra Montana's insatiable passion for noises and rhythms has driven her to acquire certifications in a diverse range of fields. From delving into the intricacies of the neurobiology of musical cognition to mastering the construction of microphones, she has pursued knowledge across various disciplines.

May, 10th 2022

I create
vibes

Introduction

From an early age, I developed the ability to attune myself to rhythms even before uttering my first words. At the tender age of five, my parents went through a divorce, and in my quest to combat loneliness, I sought solace in the cadences of the world surrounding me. I began transforming everyday objects into musical instruments, as their noises became the melodies that resonated within me. However, my pursuit of becoming a "conventional" individual led me to study guitar, clarinet, and piano, which unfortunately stifled my creativity. The rigid structure of musical scores became a confining prison for my artistic expression.

I reminded myself with conviction, "Within the realm of noise and its harmoniously imperfect nature lies the wellspring of my creativity, waiting to be discovered."

And then

Driven by an unwavering passion, I delved into an exhaustive study of everything conceivable (and inconceivable) about noise and unadulterated rhythm. My singular mission was clear: to create music that would solely consist of pure rhythmsgenuine, authentic, and incomparable. To pursue this goal, I pursued education at Berklee College, immersing myself in the exploration of how the human brain responds to rhythms and how rhythms, in turn, influence the brain. This knowledge became instrumental in structuring each of my projects with a distinct purpose in mind. My devotion to rhythm extended to an almost obsessive level, encompassing every minute aspect, ranging from the neurobiology of musical cognition to the intricate craftsmanship of microphones.

What about today?

Presently, I find myself immersed in the role of a Rhythm Designer, collaborating with cutting-edge brands and imaginative agencies across the globe. What once began as a childhood endeavor, orchestrating a symphony out of household objects at the age of five, has now evolved into a full-fledged profession. My approach to rhythm design stems from a deep reverence for the essence of pure rhythm, transcending its boundaries to create a rhythm branding strategy that resonates with your essence, your brand, and your very soul.

rhythm Strategy

Immersed within a captivating audio installation housed within a collection of interconnected containers, each container served as a unique emotional space. As visitors ventured through these distinct rooms, they were offered the opportunity to capture the rhythm emanating from their own skin, ultimately contributing to the creation of a one-of-a-kind rhythmtrack, an original composition of their own making.

    The first rhythmtrack
composed by the skin
rhythms.

the

con

cept

The Idea


In every passing moment, our skin communicates with us, responding to various sensations that come its way. Each of these experiences carries its own distinct rhythm. Music, in its essence, is an embodiment of the body, as every vibrating frequency gives birth to rhythm, which is perceived by our remarkably refined organ: the skin.

The Process


Within this audio installation, you will encounter five meticulously crafted rooms, each designed to be rhythmproofed and dedicated to a distinct experience: cold, heat, water, emotion, and the final room known as "vitaluxe." As you navigate through these rooms, you will witness the convergence of Sierra Montana and her array of rhythm equipment, creating a captivating atmosphere. To capture even the most imperceptible changes in the skin, specially designed microphones have been meticulously developed for each room, allowing for the precise capturing and sampling of these subtle shifts in rhythm.

   The
rhythm
      track

The Artist, during the journey in the container, was able to record the visitors rhythm to create a skin rhythmtrack for each guest.

The

rhythm

Every guest's rhythm sample serves as a pristine musical instrument, contributing to the composition of the official vitaluxe rhythmtrack. Here, we present a glimpse of the captivating rhythms captured from various skins.
